articles.author: Sarah Marsh
articles.description: The far-right AfD likely will score its best ever result as Europe's ailing economic powerhouse lurches rightwards. The conservative CDU/CSU bloc is set to win, but will be unlikely to secure a majority.
articles.title: Gloomy Germans vote in election which conservatives are set to win

articles.author: Tom Balmforth, Olena Harmash
articles.description: Beyond the war of words, U.S. officials opened direct talks with the Russian side in Saudi Arabia last week, shutting out Kyiv and Europe in a stunning change of policy on the war.
articles.title: Ukraine hemmed in as US backing frays three years after Russian invasion

articles.author: Jason Lange, Bo Erickson
articles.description: A notable portion of Trump's 2024 voters broke with some of the president's early actions and ideas, including the proposal to end birthright citizenship and moves to end diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.
articles.title: Trump gets middling grades on Americans' top issues, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Pope Francis, who is battling double pneumonia in hospital, had a "tranquil" night and rested, the Vatican said on Sunday.
articles.title: Pope Francis had 'tranquil' night in hospital, Vatican says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Britain will ban entry to individuals who provide significant support to the Russian state or owe their wealth to the Russian state, under new sanctions set to be announced on Monday, exactly three years after Russia invaded Ukraine.
articles.title: Britain to ban more individuals with Kremlin links in show of support for Ukraine

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Tens of thousands of people gathered on the outskirts of Beirut on Sunday to pay their respects to Hezbollah's slain leader Hassan Nasrallah, nearly five months after he was killed in an Israeli airstrike in a stunning blow to the Iran-backed group.
articles.title: Tens of thousands mourn Hezbollah's slain leader Nasrallah in mass funeral

articles.author: Lisa Richwine, Danielle Broadway
articles.description: Papal thriller "Conclave" claimed the top prize on Sunday at Hollywood's Screen Actors Guild Awards, and Timothee Chalamet's portrayal of Bob Dylan made him the surprise best actor winner, at the last major honors ahead of next weekend's Oscars.
articles.title: 'Conclave,' Chalamet win at SAG Awards, setting up Oscars battle

articles.author: Michelle Nichols
articles.description: Ukraine and the EU repeat the U.N. demand that Russia withdraw its troops and halt hostilities.
articles.title: Ahead of UN showdown on Ukraine, US urges countries to vote no on rival European bid for action

articles.author: Danielle Broadway
articles.description: "Shogun," FX's historical epic set in imperial Japan, claimed the prestigious best ensemble in a drama TV series award at Sunday's Screen Actors Guild Awards ceremony.
articles.title: 'Shogun' and 'Only Murders in the Building' win top TV honors at SAG Awards

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Philippines shares a common cause with Japan of opposing any unilateral attempt to reshape the global order, its defence minister said on Monday.
articles.title: Philippines says it shares Japan's cause of opposing unilateral attempts to reshape global order
